title: International Contractor Payment Funding
content:
International Contractor Payments Funding or ICP Funding 

These are internal transactions to transfer funds from one Gusto bank account to another Gusto bank account. A few ways to identify that these are ICP funding transactions: 

  • The BT will have Chase International Contractor Payments as it's Origination Account
  • There will be another BT for the same amount from Chase Operations
  • Look up the amount in your Gmail and you will see Treasury's email confirming the transfer
  • Look up the amount in Payment-Alerts Channel in Slack

    This type of BT will always have 2 transactions: Wire Out and Wire In. The Electronic Payment Creator Tool will be used to create an electronic payment
